HWTERR Type: TERRIERDescription: HD
LBCASE LB Address: 37 London RoadLB Grade: LOCALLB Ref: 260

description: T.101 Lime - 3m Crown reduction. G.163 Apple x2 - Fell. T.190 Oak - Crown lift to 5m from ground level & 10% crown thin. G.220 Silver Birch - Fell. T.225a Beech (adj T.225) - Reduce damaged limb over highway past the damage to suitable growth points. T.230 Hornbeam - Remove lowest branch over highway. T.233 Hazel - Dismantle and retain stump to create coppice stool. G.235 Elm/T.20 Holly/T.49 Cherry - Fell. G.35 Oak - Remove 1 of 2 co-dominant stems nearest No. 44. G.57 Silver Birch closest building - 1.5m lateral reduction from building. G.57 Paper Birch nr boundary wall - 20% lateral reduction over parking area. G.58 Silver Birch/G.58 Paper Birch - 20% lateral reduction over parking area. G.58 Japanese Maple x3 - 20% Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points. T.76 Cedar - 20% lateral reduction over adjacent Yew (T.75), providing 1-2m clearance from building. T.126 Cherry - 10% Holistic crown reduction & thin. G.162 Elm x3 - Fell. T.234 Hornbeam - 20% lift & reduce lower canopy over road. G.235 Beech/Sycamore/Elm - Fell non-upright forms & reduce remaining canopies over road by 20%. T.236 London Plane - 20% Holistic crown reduction & crown lift to 5m from ground level over road. T.238 Oak & Sycamore - Fell. T.225 Beech - 25% Holistic crown reduction & 10% crown thin (included bark). T.214 Beech - Reduce limb & shape to suitable growth points. T.232 Multi-stemmed Oak - Fell.
